Icon value is not a valid URL: Icon value is not a valid URL
Currency should be provided in currency: Currency should be provided in currency code format (ISO 4217)
Color must be provided in HEX color form: Color must be provided in HEX color format (e.g. #FFFFFF)
Credit limit should be greater or equal: Credit limit should be greater or equal to zero
Available balance should be greater or e: Available balance should be greater or equal to zero
Available balance should be less than or: Available balance should be less than or equal to credit limit
